DOC.brief_summary: The investigator examine association preoperative frailty postoperative outcome resource utilization emergency general surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Frailty Postoperative Outcomes After Emergency General Surgery
DOC.criteria: All resident Ontario age 65 year surgery date valid provincial health insurance emergency general surgery procedure ( large bowel surgery , small bowel surgery , cholecystectomy , control hemorrhage duodenal ulcer , lysis adhesion , appendectomy , laparotomy ) No valid provincial health insurance
